item.description: Half-Orc Barbarian ![[Pasted image 20221209174859.png]] Background doesnâ€™t like being angry his foster parents were killed by a band of bandits most of them band have been brought to justice, except the leader swore that he will find the murderer of his forster parents (the leader of the band of bandits) Important Relations Adventuring with [[The Bean Bois/Avaaros]], [[The Bean Bois/Davaelor]], [[The Bean Bois/Heilar]], [[Reznak]], [[Ruby]], [[Runa]], and [[The Bean Bois/Tia]] and, newly also [[Sealion]]
